title: 17  Jim Dine, drawing, from Crash, 1960
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">17  
Jim Dine (American, born 1935)  
Drawing, from Crash  
1960  
One drawing from a set of four, pen and brush and red ink, with wiping, on cream wove paper; 76.4 × 56.8 cm (30 1/16 × 22 3/8 in.)  
Promised gift of the artist, 48.2012

</section><section id="figures">Jim Dine, drawing, from Crash, 1960.

</section>
